description: No matter your adventures take you, The Men's Intraknit™ Merino Tech 1/2 Zip Hoodie was created to ensure your exploration starts and ends comfortably. Featuring our Intraknit™ technology with targeted mesh ventilation for breathability and a water-resistant finish for protection from the elements, you're free to explore without limits.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Merino Tech 1/2 Zip Hoodie - Mens
